CustomField.description: Identifies account type for StartTrack sub accounts (mastered in TEAMS). Not used for Aus Post sub accounts (mastered in SAP). Follower - This account will pay it's own invoice; Offspring of Leader - Leader will pay invoice for this sub account; Offspring of Follower - The chosen follower account will pay the invoice.
CustomField.label: Account Type

value.label: Offspring - Hierarchy Relationship (Parent under same Leader)
